mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_b_farm_standar (breed_name, feed_type, farm_id, mortality_flag, daily_motality, cum_motality, body_weight, daily_intake, bak1, bak2, bak3, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time) VALUES (#{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{feedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{mortalityFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyMotality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cumMotality,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{bodyWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{dailyIntake,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{bak1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bak2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{bak3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE s_b_farm_standar SET breed_name = #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feed_type = #{feedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mortality_flag = #{mortalityFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daily_motality = #{dailyMotality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cum_motality = #{cumMotality,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, body_weight = #{bodyWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, daily_intake = #{dailyIntake,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bak1 = #{bak1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bak2 = #{bak2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bak3 = #{bak3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_person = #{modifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, breed_name, feed_type, farm_id, mortality_flag, daily_motality, cum_motality, body_weight, daily_intake, bak1, bak2, bak3, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time FROM s_b_farm_standar WHERE farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND feed_type = 'mixed'
